## Molar Mass

- $\mathrm{CO_2}$ $44.010\ \frac{\mathrm{g}}{\mathrm{mol}}$ or $44.010\ \frac{\mathrm{lb_m}}{\text{lb-mol}}$
- 15 mass units on N.I.S.T website
- Most common moles are
  - $\text{g-mol}$ or $\text{mol}$
  - $\text{kg-mol}$ or $\text{kmol}$
  - $\text{tonne-mol}$
  - $\text{lb-mol}$
  - $\text{ton-mol}$
